snippet: A Wisconsin drifter convicted of murdering a third-grade boy in a beach restroom told jurors today that he should be executed because he is out to destroy society and would kill again in a minute.    ''My whole purpose in life is to help destroy y...
lead_paragraph: A Wisconsin drifter convicted of murdering a third-grade boy in a beach restroom told jurors today that he should be executed because he is out to destroy society and would kill again in a minute. ''My whole purpose in life is to help destroy your society,'' the drifter, Brandon H. Wilson, told jurors in San Diego County Superior Court. ''You people are here as representatives of that society and as such you should do everything in your power to rid the world of me.''
abstract: Brandon H Wilson, Wisconsin drifter convicted of 1998 murder of third-grade student Matthew Cecchi in beach restroom, tells jurors in sentencing phase of trial in San Diego court he should be executed because he is out to destroy society and will kill again (S)

headline.main: Jury Told, Rid World of Me
